name: Guard Swap
effect: Never Fail. Swap the User's Base Defense and Sp Defense with the target. If this would lower the Foe's Base Stats by greater than three, it only lower the Stats by three. If this would raise the User's Base stats by greater than three, it only raises them by three. Swap the User's Defense and Sp. Defense Stat Changes with the Foe.
description: The Pokemon employs its psychic power to make the opponent feel like its got your frailty and make the user feel like it got the target's resilience.
